name: Battle Spirit
effects: Increase physical damage against Aquatics by 50%
Increase physical damage against Demons by 50%
Increase physical damage against Machinas by 50%
Increase physical damage against Stones by 50%

name: Battle Spirit
戰鬥精神
싸움의 영혼
Esprit de combat
Kampfgeist
Espíritu combativo
desc_short: Increase physical damage dealt to aquans, demons, machina, and stone monsters
物理攻擊時提高對水生惡魔機械石系魔物的傷害
물리공격 시 수중, 악마, 기계, 암석형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Augmente les dégâts physiques infligés aux aqua., démons, machines et aux monstres de pierre
Mehr physischer Schaden gegen Wasser-, Dämonen-, Maschinen und Steinmonster.
Aumenta el daño físico contra acuáticos, demonios, máquinas y monstruos de piedra
desc_long: Increases physical damage dealt to aquans, demons, machina, and stone monsters.
物理攻擊時提高對水生惡魔機械石系魔物的傷害。
물리공격 시 수중, 악마, 기계, 암석형 마물에게 주는 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les dégâts physiques infligés aux aquatiques, démons, machines et aux monstres de pierre.
Mehr physischer Schaden gegen Wasser-, Dämonen-, Maschinen und Steinmonster.
Aumenta el daño físico contra acuáticos, demonios, máquinas y monstruos de piedra.
